verses.verse: <S%G235>But<s%> have <S%G550>renounced<s%> the hidden <S%G2927>things<s%> of <S%G152>dishonesty<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3834>craftiness<s%>, <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1389>handling<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1389>deceitfully<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> by <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>'s <S%G4893>conscience<s%> in the sight <S%G1799>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2316>god<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> has <S%G5186%G99999>blinded<s%> the <S%G3540>minds<s%> of them which believe <S%G571>not<s%>, <S%G3361>lest<s%> the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, should <S%G826>shine<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2036>commanded<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> to <S%G2989>shine<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, has <S%G2989>shined<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G4314>to<s%> give the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3749>earthen<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G5236>excellency<s%> of the <S%G1411>power<s%> may <S%G5600>be<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>.

We are <S%G2346>troubled<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> every <S%G3956>side<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4729>distressed<s%>; we are <S%G639>perplexed<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G1820>despair<s%>;

<S%G3842>Always<s%> <S%G4064>carrying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> the <S%G3500>dying<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> might be made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>.

<S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>, according <S%G2596>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, I <S%G4100>believed<s%>, and <S%G1352>therefore<s%> have I <S%G2980>spoken<s%>; <S%G4100>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1352>therefore<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>;

<S%G1063>For<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sakes<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G4121>abundant<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G4052>might<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> of <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G4052>redound<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For which <S%G1352>cause<s%> we <S%G1573>faint<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1487%G99999>though<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1854>outward<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1311>perish<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> the <S%G2081>inward<s%> man is <S%G341>renewed<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>by<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1645>light<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%>, which is but for a <S%G3910>moment<s%>, <S%G2716>works<s%> for <S%G2254%G99999>us<s%> a <S%G5236%G99999>far<s%> more <S%G5236>exceedingly<s%> and <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G922>weight<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%>;

While <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G4648>look<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> at the <S%G3588>things<s%> which are <S%G991>seen<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> at the <S%G3588>things<s%> which <S%G991>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G991>seen<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which are <S%G991>seen<s%> are <S%G4340>temporal<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which <S%G991>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G991>seen<s%> are <S%G166>eternal<s%>.
